duties_responsibilities.duty: Own operational readiness of both new and existing Cloud Learning services and offerings.
Collaborate with Offer Practice Leads and the Order Fulfillment teams to stress test all offerings for internal and external customers.
Be a thought leader in training delivery, driving process improvements using training data.
Advise account teams on agreement structure, business motion, pricing, funding options, pitch decks, and approval of quotes.
Manage delivery accuracy with a customer-first approach, ensuring compliance and minimizing intervention by non-operational teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
8 years of experience in customer-facing IT training roles, including cloud training.
Excellent business process improvement and written/verbal communication skills.
Excellent leadership, quantitative reasoning, problem-solving, creativity, and strategic skills.
